outputFile.comment: The path to save the generated image
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image. Default is 480
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image. Default is 320
sleepInterval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
useTor.comment: Indicates whether remote calls should use torify for privacy. Experimental
whirlpoolurl.comment: The base url to use for retrieving whirlpool information.  You should use your local whirlpool cli, not the whirlpool coordinator.
apiKey.comment: You must specify the apiKey for communicating with your local whirlpool instance.
colorBackground.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorHeader.comment: The color to use for the image header text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorDataLabel.comment: The color of the text for field labels expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorDataValue.comment: The color of the text for field values expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorDataOn.comment: The color of the indicator when something is on/true. Default `#40ff40`
colorDataOff.comment: The color of the indicator when something is off/false. Default `#ff4040`
colorTextFG.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
